5* If at the end of the three-year commitment there remains any

time, any unexpended cash balance is to be returned to the
Foundation.
6. Any anticipated change in the itemized budget which has been
approved for a particular year should be made in writing and
submitted to the Foundation for approval prior to expenditure.
7* Any salary increases or contributions to retirement pi *na above

8. The NAJ3B agrees to disseminate, through established channels of
communication or by special reports, pertinent information relat¬
ing to tile results, findings, or methods developed through this
grant.
9* We request that you release no publicity concerning this commit¬
ment until you receive our first payment. The Foundation ordi¬
narily does not publicize its assistance to projects and programs
unless they appear to be o particular public interest. In the
event such a Foundation news release appears desirable, we will
accompany the first payment to you with a copy o our release
post-dated ten days 30 that you may synchronize with that date
any release you may be contemplating. It is, of course, entirely
optional with you as to whether you publicize the commitment.
10. In case of national emergency the Foundation reserves the right
to review the program and negotiate with the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters as to modification or termination of
the program in view of the national situation*
